text:
@WhiteHouse @PressSec Trump pretends that he never downplayed COVID-19 and that he never called it a hoax.
Trump pretends that he didn’t ignore intelligence.
He pretends that he didn’t remove our pandemic experts & CDC staff in China.
Trump pretends that he didn’t fail to deliver needed virus testing.
